title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio built with React showcasing my projects, skills, and achievements with dark/light mode and smooth animations.

title: Primex Industries
description: A professional company website for Primex Industries, designed in WordPress to showcase their products, services, and industrial expertise.

title: WaterBill Website
description: A smart and user-friendly water billing management system that allows easy entry, update, and tracking of consumer bills with multilingual (Punjabi/English) support and downloadable Excel reports.

title: Bhatoy's Job portal
description: A job portal website where recruiters can post job openings and employees can easily apply for positions — built using PHP, HTML, MySQL, and Bootstrap CSS.

title: Salon booking, Blogging and Ecommerce Website
description: An e-commerce and booking website where users can buy beauty products and book bridal and other salon services — built with PHP, HTML, MySQL and Bootstrap CSS.

title: Kindrops-Blood Bank
description: A salon booking web app built with PHP and MySQL where users can schedule appointments and manage bookings easily.

title: Pocket Notes App
description: A simple React notes application allowing users to create, group, and manage notes with a responsive sidebar and local storage support.
